title: Watching NA makes me angry
body:
So there are all these other regions that need to participate in Play-Ins.

Yet, you've got this garbage-arse, waste-of-space region called NA who get the red carpet rolled out for them.

Anyone else watching TL v FW? It's a joke.

replies.body: U do realize that only flash wolves and EVOS have to go through a play in stage right? Every other team goes went directly in. It’s just the advantage they get by being a big region

Dude, who do you think FW and EVOS played to get in? There were 6 other teams - OCE being one of them.

They have to run this stupid gauntlet while NA - arguably the worst region in the world - gets in, no worries.

> [{quoted}](name=kaboomblah,realm=OCE,application-id=ATM3HYki,discussion-id=GluwjfvU,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-05-13T06:43:29.004+0000)
>
> Dude, who do you think FW and EVOS played to get in? There were 6 other teams - OCE being one of them.
> 
> They have to run this stupid gauntlet while NA - arguably the worst region in the world - gets in, no worries.

Lol your kidding right. To call NA one of the worst regions in the world you have to be joking right? I will say TL is under performing at msi but to even think that NA is completely shit is hilarious. If any NA team was to vs Dire Wolves we would get smashed cos all oce teams are completely trash compared to any other region.

I said "arguably the worst region in the world".

As for "one of the worst regions in the world"? Dude, that's not even arguable. That is definitely the case.

With all the support they get, they still can't get anywhere near an international title. They're second to Korea in terms of support for E-sports. Yet, they're getting beaten - not even beaten, straight up humiliated - against places like Vietnam.

> [{quoted}](name=kaboomblah,realm=OCE,application-id=ATM3HYki,discussion-id=GluwjfvU,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2018-05-13T07:29:12.263+0000)
>
> I said "arguably the worst region in the world".
> 
> As for "one of the worst regions in the world"? Dude, that's not even arguable. That is definitely the case.
> 
> With all the support they get, they still can't get anywhere near an international title. They're second to Korea in terms of support for E-sports. Yet, they're getting beaten - not even beaten, straight up humiliated - against places like Vietnam.

In case u haven’t noticed no one can beat Korea, NA or EU the only world titles that Korea don’t have are season 1 and 2. Season 1 was won by fnatic and season 2 was Taipei Assassins. Also just because 1 team is underperforming doesn’t make the region weak

Sigh.
It's like you're reinforcing my point.

Here is my train of thought.
1. To represent your region at MSi means you are currently the strongest in your region.
2. TL is representing NA.
3. TL fucking stink.
4. NA's best team stinks.
5. NA stinks.
6. Also, teams that were required to participate in Play-Ins are demolishing NA.
7. Sport is a meritocracy. Therefore, NA shouldn't be automatically included, since they stink.

Also, apply the above to all previous international NA performances.
That 1st game, the sub support is HOrrible. He wasted flash, cant position for shit, every screen time he get - 60% of it is getting hit by morg Q.
